items.title: 26 small caps gain 10-40% despite underperformance by broader indices
items.description: For the week, the BSE Sensex index fell 294.64 points or 0.36 percent to finish at 81463.09, and Nifty50 declined 131.4 points or 0.52 percent to close at 24837. However, in this month till now Sensex and Nifty shed 2.5 percent each.
